citations.narrative:
IACUC meeting minutes and semi-annual inspection reports were unavailable during this inspection. Information
that these records are being kept was provided, but the documentation could not be accessed. Inaccessible
records can result in a lack of accurate information being maintained as required by this section. Correct by 5-2-18.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
